zh.our_advantage_one_value_01: 抵押区块链数字资产，履约期间可继续持有您的数字资产，无需忍痛抛售
zh.our_advantage_two_value_01: 智能合约托管抵押资产，自动触发合约内容，保证所有贷款服务有效履约
zh.our_advantage_three_value_01: 提供美元、韩元、人民币贷款，根据需要自由选择贷款法币种类
zh.our_advantage_four_value_01: 24H全球开通放款服务，随时随地有币就能贷

en.our_advantage_one_value_01: If mortgaging blockchain digital assets, you can hold your digital assets during the effective contract term
en.our_advantage_two_value_01: Smart contracts host mortgaged assets, automatically trigger contract content, and ensure that all loan services are effectively executed
en.our_advantage_three_value_01: Provide US dollar, Korean won, RMB loans, and fiat loan upon demand
en.our_advantage_four_value_01: 24H global opening lending service, you can borrow money at any time and anywhere
